        // Clear map overlays
        function clearMap() {
            if (!window.impactMap) return;
            
            // Remove all layers except the base tile layer
            window.impactMap.eachLayer(layer => {
                if (layer instanceof L.Circle) {
                    window.impactMap.removeLayer(layer);
                }
            });
        }

        // Update impact map with simulation data
        function updateImpactMap(data) {
            if (!window.impactMap) return;
            
            // Clear existing overlays
            clearMap();
            
            // For demonstration, we'll use a random location
            const lat = Math.random() * 180 - 90;
            const lng = Math.random() * 360 - 180;
            
            // Add crater zone
            L.circle([lat, lng], {
                color: 'red',
                fillColor: '#f03',
                fillOpacity: 0.3,
                radius: data.craterDiameter * 1000
            }).addTo(window.impactMap).bindPopup('Crater Zone');
            
            // Add seismic zone
            L.circle([lat, lng], {
                color: 'orange',
                fillColor: '#ffa500',
                fillOpacity: 0.2,
                radius: data.craterDiameter * 5000
            }).addTo(window.impactMap).bindPopup('Seismic Zone');
            
            // Add tsunami zone if ocean impact
            if (data.location === 'ocean' || data.location === 'coastal') {
                L.circle([lat, lng], {
                    color: 'blue',
                    fillColor: '#00f',
                    fillOpacity: 0.2,
                    radius: data.craterDiameter * 10000
                }).addTo(window.impactMap).bindPopup('Tsunami Zone');
            }
            
            // Center map on the impact point
            window.impactMap.setView([lat, lng], 5);
        }

        // Initialize 3D visualization
        function init3DVisualization() {
            const container = document.getElementById('threejs-container');
            
            // Create a simple 3D scene with Earth and an asteroid
            const scene = new THREE.Scene();
            const camera = new THREE.PerspectiveCamera(75, container.clientWidth / container.clientHeight, 0.1, 1000);
            const renderer = new THREE.WebGLRenderer({ antialias: true });
            
            renderer.setSize(container.clientWidth, container.clientHeight);
            container.innerHTML = '';
            container.appendChild(renderer.domElement);
            
            // Add Earth
            const earthGeometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(2, 32, 32);
            const earthMaterial = new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({ 
                color: 0x3a7ca5,
                specular: 0x555555,
                shininess: 30
            });
            const earth = new THREE.Mesh(earthGeometry, earthMaterial);
            scene.add(earth);
            
            // Add asteroid
            const asteroidGeometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(0.2, 16, 16);
            const asteroidMaterial = new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({ color: 0xaaaaaa });
            const asteroid = new THREE.Mesh(asteroidGeometry, asteroidMaterial);
            asteroid.position.set(5, 0, 0);
            scene.add(asteroid);
            
            // Add lights
            const ambientLight = new THREE.AmbientLight(0x404040);
            scene.add(ambientLight);
            
            const directionalLight = new THREE.DirectionalLight(0xffffff, 1);
            directionalLight.position.set(5, 5, 5);
            scene.add(directionalLight);
            
            // Position camera
            camera.position.z = 10;
            
            // Animation loop
            function animate() {
                requestAnimationFrame(animate);
                
                earth.rotation.y += 0.01;
                asteroid.rotation.y += 0.02;
                
                renderer.render(scene, camera);
            }
            
            animate();
            
            // Store scene for later use
            window.threeScene = {
                scene,
                camera,
                renderer,
                earth,
                asteroid
            };
        }

        // Reset 3D view
        function reset3DView() {
            if (!window.threeScene) return;
            
            const { camera, asteroid } = window.threeScene;
            
            camera.position.set(0, 0, 10);
            camera.lookAt(0, 0, 0);
            
            asteroid.position.set(5, 0, 0);
        }

        // Add asteroid to 3D scene
        function addAsteroidTo3D() {
            if (!window.threeScene) return;
            
            const { scene } = window.threeScene;
            
            const asteroidGeometry = new THREE.SphereGeometry(0.1, 12, 12);
            const asteroidMaterial = new THREE.MeshPhongMaterial({ color: 0xaaaaaa });
            const asteroid = new THREE.Mesh(asteroidGeometry, asteroidMaterial);
            
            // Random position
            asteroid.position.set(
                (Math.random() - 0.5) * 8,
                (Math.random() - 0.5) * 8,
                (Math.random() - 0.5) * 8
            );
            
            scene.add(asteroid);
        }

        // Simulate orbit in 3D
        function simulateOrbit() {
            if (!window.threeScene) return;
            
            const { asteroid } = window.threeScene;
            
            // Simple orbital motion
            let angle = 0;
            const radius = 5;
            const speed = 0.01;
            
            function orbit() {
                angle += speed;
                asteroid.position.x = Math.cos(angle) * radius;
                asteroid.position.z = Math.sin(angle) * radius;
                
                requestAnimationFrame(orbit);
            }
            
            orbit();
        }

      // Game variables
let gameState = {
    running: false,
    asteroids: [],
    asteroidsDestroyed: 0,
    totalAsteroids: 25,
    timeLeft: 60,
    gameInterval: null,
    score: 0
};

// Initialize game
function initGame() {
    const canvas = document.getElementById('game-canvas');
    const ctx = canvas.getContext('2d');
    
    // Set canvas size
    canvas.width = canvas.parentElement.clientWidth;
    canvas.height = 500;
    
    // Clear the canvas
    ctx.fillStyle = '#0b1a30';
    ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
    
    // Draw Earth
    drawEarth(ctx, canvas);
    
    // Draw game title
    ctx.fillStyle = '#ff9d00';
    ctx.font = '24px Arial';
    ctx.textAlign = 'center';
    ctx.fillText('Asteroid Defense Game', canvas.width / 2, canvas.height / 2 - 50);
    
    ctx.fillStyle = '#e0f2ff';
    ctx.font = '16px Arial';
    ctx.fillText('Click "Start Game" to defend Earth from 25 asteroids!', canvas.width / 2, canvas.height / 2);
    
    // Store canvas context for game functions
    window.gameContext = {
        canvas,
        ctx,
        running: false
    };
    
    // Reset game state
    gameState = {
        running: false,
        asteroids: [],
        asteroidsDestroyed: 0,
        totalAsteroids: 25,
        timeLeft: 60,
        gameInterval: null,
        score: 0
    };
    
    updateGameDisplay();
}

// Draw Earth
function drawEarth(ctx, canvas) {
    const centerX = canvas.width / 2;
    const earthY = canvas.height - 50;
    
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(centerX, earthY, 40, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fillStyle = '#3a7ca5';
    ctx.fill();
    
    // Add some details to make it look like Earth
    ctx.fillStyle = '#2a5c7a';
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(centerX - 15, earthY - 10, 10, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fill();
    
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(centerX + 20, earthY + 15, 15, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fill();
}

// Start game
function startGame() {
    if (gameState.running) return;
    
    gameState.running = true;
    gameState.timeLeft = 60;
    gameState.asteroidsDestroyed = 0;
    gameState.score = 0;
    gameState.asteroids = [];
    
    updateGameDisplay();
    
    // Create initial asteroids
    createAsteroids(25);
    
    // Start game loop
    gameState.gameInterval = setInterval(gameLoop, 1000 / 60); // 60 FPS
    
    // Start countdown timer
    const timerInterval = setInterval(() => {
        if (gameState.running) {
            gameState.timeLeft--;
            updateGameDisplay();
            
            if (gameState.timeLeft <= 0) {
                clearInterval(timerInterval);
                endGame(false); // Time's up - player lost
            }
        } else {
            clearInterval(timerInterval);
        }
    }, 1000);
    
    // Store timer interval for cleanup
    gameState.timerInterval = timerInterval;
}

// Create asteroids
function createAsteroids(count) {
    const canvas = window.gameContext.canvas;
    
    for (let i = 0; i < count; i++) {
        const size = Math.random() * 20 + 15; // 15-35px
        const x = Math.random() * (canvas.width - size * 2) + size;
        const y = Math.random() * (canvas.height / 2) - 100; // Start above the visible area
        
        // Different asteroid types with different colors
        const types = [
            { color: '#aaaaaa', speed: 0.5 }, // Gray - slow
            { color: '#8c8c8c', speed: 0.7 }, // Dark gray - medium
            { color: '#5a5a5a', speed: 1.0 }  // Charcoal - fast
        ];
        
        const type = types[Math.floor(Math.random() * types.length)];
        
        gameState.asteroids.push({
            x,
            y,
            size,
            color: type.color,
            speed: type.speed,
            destroyed: false
        });
    }
}

// Game loop
function gameLoop() {
    if (!gameState.running) return;
    
    const { canvas, ctx } = window.gameContext;
    
    // Clear canvas
    ctx.fillStyle = '#0b1a30';
    ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
    
    // Draw Earth
    drawEarth(ctx, canvas);
    
    // Update and draw asteroids
    updateAsteroids();
    drawAsteroids();
    
    // Check win condition
    if (gameState.asteroidsDestroyed >= gameState.totalAsteroids) {
        endGame(true); // Player won
    }
}

// Update asteroid positions
function updateAsteroids() {
    const canvas = window.gameContext.canvas;
    
    gameState.asteroids.forEach(asteroid => {
        if (!asteroid.destroyed) {
            // Move asteroid downward
            asteroid.y += asteroid.speed;
            
            // If asteroid goes below the screen, reset it to the top
            if (asteroid.y > canvas.height + asteroid.size) {
                asteroid.y = -asteroid.size;
                asteroid.x = Math.random() * (canvas.width - asteroid.size * 2) + asteroid.size;
            }
        }
    });
}

// Draw asteroids
function drawAsteroids() {
    const { ctx } = window.gameContext;
    
    gameState.asteroids.forEach(asteroid => {
        if (!asteroid.destroyed) {
            ctx.beginPath();
            ctx.arc(asteroid.x, asteroid.y, asteroid.size, 0, Math.PI * 2);
            ctx.fillStyle = asteroid.color;
            ctx.fill();
            
            // Add some details to make it look like an asteroid
            ctx.fillStyle = '#333333';
            ctx.beginPath();
            ctx.arc(asteroid.x - asteroid.size/3, asteroid.y - asteroid.size/4, asteroid.size/4, 0, Math.PI * 2);
            ctx.fill();
            
            ctx.beginPath();
            ctx.arc(asteroid.x + asteroid.size/3, asteroid.y + asteroid.size/4, asteroid.size/5, 0, Math.PI * 2);
            ctx.fill();
        }
    });
}

// Handle asteroid click
function handleAsteroidClick(event) {
    if (!gameState.running) return;
    
    const canvas = window.gameContext.canvas;
    const rect = canvas.getBoundingClientRect();
    const x = event.clientX - rect.left;
    const y = event.clientY - rect.top;
    
    // Check if any asteroid was clicked
    gameState.asteroids.forEach(asteroid => {
        if (!asteroid.destroyed) {
            const distance = Math.sqrt(
                Math.pow(x - asteroid.x, 2) + Math.pow(y - asteroid.y, 2)
            );
            
            if (distance <= asteroid.size) {
                // Asteroid was clicked - destroy it
                asteroid.destroyed = true;
                gameState.asteroidsDestroyed++;
                gameState.score += 100;
                
                // Add explosion effect
                createExplosion(asteroid.x, asteroid.y, asteroid.size);
                
                updateGameDisplay();
            }
        }
    });
}

// Create explosion effect
function createExplosion(x, y, size) {
    const { ctx } = window.gameContext;
    
    // Draw explosion
    const gradient = ctx.createRadialGradient(x, y, 0, x, y, size * 2);
    gradient.addColorStop(0, '#ff9d00');
    gradient.addColorStop(0.7, '#ff4d00');
    gradient.addColorStop(1, 'transparent');
    
    ctx.beginPath();
    ctx.arc(x, y, size * 2, 0, Math.PI * 2);
    ctx.fillStyle = gradient;
    ctx.fill();
    
    // Small delay to show explosion
    setTimeout(() => {
        // Redraw the game to remove the explosion
        if (gameState.running) {
            gameLoop();
        }
    }, 100);
}

// Update game display
function updateGameDisplay() {
    document.getElementById('game-score').textContent = gameState.score;
    document.getElementById('asteroids-destroyed').textContent = gameState.asteroidsDestroyed;
    document.getElementById('time-remaining').textContent = gameState.timeLeft + 's';
    document.getElementById('time-left').textContent = gameState.timeLeft;
    document.getElementById('asteroids-left').textContent = gameState.totalAsteroids - gameState.asteroidsDestroyed;
}

// End game
function endGame(won) {
    gameState.running = false;
    
    clearInterval(gameState.gameInterval);
    clearInterval(gameState.timerInterval);
    
    const { ctx, canvas } = window.gameContext;
    
    // Draw game over message
    ctx.fillStyle = 'rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7)';
    ctx.fillRect(0, 0, canvas.width, canvas.height);
    
    ctx.fillStyle = won ? '#4caf50' : '#ff4d00';
    ctx.font = '36px Arial';
    ctx.textAlign = 'center';
    ctx.fillText(won ? 'Mission Successful!' : 'Mission Failed!', canvas.width / 2, canvas.height / 2 - 50);
    
    ctx.fillStyle = '#e0f2ff';
    ctx.font = '24px Arial';
    ctx.fillText(won ? 'Earth is safe from Impactor 2025!' : 'Time is up! Earth was hit by asteroids.', canvas.width / 2, canvas.height / 2);
    
    ctx.font = '20px Arial';
    ctx.fillText(`Asteroids destroyed: ${gameState.asteroidsDestroyed}/${gameState.totalAsteroids}`, canvas.width / 2, canvas.height / 2 + 50);
    ctx.fillText(`Score: ${gameState.score}`, canvas.width / 2, canvas.height / 2 + 80);
    
    // Update status
    document.getElementById('game-status').textContent = won ? 'Mission Successful!' : 'Mission Failed!';
    document.getElementById('game-status').style.color = won ? '#4caf50' : '#ff4d00';
}

// Pause game
function pauseGame() {
    if (!gameState.running) return;
    
    gameState.running = !gameState.running;
    
    if (gameState.running) {
        // Resume game
        gameState.gameInterval = setInterval(gameLoop, 1000 / 60);
        document.getElementById('game-status').textContent = 'Game Running';
    } else {
        // Pause game
        clearInterval(gameState.gameInterval);
        document.getElementById('game-status').textContent = 'Game Paused';
    }
}

// Reset game
function resetGame() {
    // Clear intervals
    clearInterval(gameState.gameInterval);
    clearInterval(gameState.timerInterval);
    
    // Reset game state
    gameState.running = false;
    
    // Reinitialize game
    initGame();
    
    // Update status
    document.getElementById('game-status').textContent = 'Click Start to Play';
    document.getElementById('game-status').style.color = '#e0f2ff';
}

// Set up game event listeners
function setupGameEventListeners() {
    document.getElementById('start-game').addEventListener('click', startGame);
    document.getElementById('pause-game').addEventListener('click', pauseGame);
    document.getElementById('reset-game').addEventListener('click', resetGame);
    
    // Add click event to canvas
    const canvas = document.getElementById('game-canvas');
    canvas.addEventListener('click', handleAsteroidClick);
}

// Initialize game when the page loads
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
    // Initialize game when game tab is active
    document.querySelectorAll('.tab').forEach(tab => {
        tab.addEventListener('click', () => {
            if (tab.dataset.tab === 'game') {
                initGame();
            }
        });
    });
    
    // Set up game event listeners
    setupGameEventListeners();
    
    // Initialize game if we're on the game tab
    if (document.getElementById('game').classList.contains('active')) {
        initGame();
    }
});
// Fetch asteroid data from NASA API
async function fetchAsteroidData() {
    const days = document.getElementById('days-slider').value;
    const hazardousOnly = document.getElementById('hazardous-only').checked;
    const statusDiv = document.getElementById('api-status');
    
    statusDiv.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-sync fa-spin"></i> Fetching data from NASA API...';
    statusDiv.style.color = '#ff9d00';
    
    try {
        const response = await fetch(
            `${nasaConfig.baseUrl}/feed?start_date=${getCurrentDate()}&end_date=${getFutureDate(days)}&api_key=${nasaConfig.apiKey}`
        );
        
        if (!response.ok) {
            throw new Error(`HTTP error! status: ${response.status}`);
        }
        
        const data = await response.json();
        processAsteroidData(data, hazardousOnly);
        
        statusDiv.innerHTML = '<i class="fas fa-check-circle"></i> Data loaded successfully';
        statusDiv.style.color = '#4caf50';
        
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('Error fetching asteroid data:', error);
        statusDiv.innerHTML = `<i class="fas fa-exclamation-circle"></i> Error: ${error.message}`;
        statusDiv.style.color = '#ff4d00';
        
        // Fallback to sample data if API fails
        useSampleAsteroidData(hazardousOnly);
    }
}

// Get current date in YYYY-MM-DD format
function getCurrentDate() {
    return new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];
}

// Get future date for API request
function getFutureDate(days) {
    const date = new Date();
    date.setDate(date.getDate() + parseInt(days));
    return date.toISOString().split('T')[0];
}

// Process asteroid data from NASA API
function processAsteroidData(data, hazardousOnly) {
    const asteroids = [];
    
    // Extract asteroids from the response
    for (const date in data.near_earth_objects) {
        asteroids.push(...data.near_earth_objects[date]);
    }
    
    // Filter if only hazardous asteroids are requested
    let filteredAsteroids = hazardousOnly ? 
        asteroids.filter(asteroid => asteroid.is_potentially_hazardous_asteroid) : 
        asteroids;
    
    // Store for later use
    window.currentAsteroidData = filteredAsteroids;
    
    // Update UI
    updateAsteroidList(filteredAsteroids);
    updateAsteroidStats(filteredAsteroids);
    plotAsteroidsOnMap(filteredAsteroids);
}

// Update asteroid list in UI
function updateAsteroidList(asteroids) {
    const listContainer = document.getElementById('asteroids-list');
    
    if (asteroids.length === 0) {
        listContainer.innerHTML = '<p>No asteroids found matching your criteria.</p>';
        return;
    }
    
    let html = '';
    asteroids.forEach(asteroid => {
        const closeApproach = asteroid.close_approach_data[0];
        const diameter = asteroid.estimated_diameter.kilometers.estimated_diameter_max;
        const missDistance = parseFloat(closeApproach.miss_distance.kilometers).toLocaleString();
        
        html += `
            <div class="asteroid-item ${asteroid.is_potentially_hazardous_asteroid ? 'hazardous' : ''}" 
                 data-asteroid-id="${asteroid.id}">
                <div class="asteroid-name">${asteroid.name}</div>
                <div class="asteroid-details">
                    <div class="asteroid-detail">
                        <span class="detail-label">Diameter:</span> ${diameter.toFixed(3)} km
                    </div>
                    <div class="asteroid-detail">
                        <span class="detail-label">Velocity:</span> ${parseFloat(closeApproach.relative_velocity.kilometers_per_second).toFixed(2)} km/s
                    </div>
                    <div class="asteroid-detail">
                        <span class="detail-label">Miss Distance:</span> ${missDistance} km
                    </div>
                    <div class="asteroid-detail">
                        <span class="detail-label">Date:</span> ${new Date(closeApproach.close_approach_date).toLocaleDateString()}
                    </div>
                </div>
                ${asteroid.is_potentially_hazardous_asteroid ? 
                    '<div style="color: #ff4d00; margin-top: 5px;"><i class="fas fa-exclamation-triangle"></i> Potentially Hazardous</div>' : ''}
            </div>
        `;
    });
    
    listContainer.innerHTML = html;
    
    // Add click events to asteroid items
    listContainer.querySelectorAll('.asteroid-item').forEach(item => {
        item.addEventListener('click', function() {
            const asteroidId = this.dataset.asteroidId;
            const asteroid = asteroids.find(a => a.id === asteroidId);
            simulateAsteroidImpact(asteroid);
        });
    });
}

// Update asteroid statistics
function updateAsteroidStats(asteroids) {
    const statsContainer = document.getElementById('asteroid-stats');
    
    const total = asteroids.length;
    const hazardous = asteroids.filter(a => a.is_potentially_hazardous_asteroid).length;
    
    let closestApproach = 'N/A';
    let largestDiameter = 0;
    
    if (asteroids.length > 0) {
        // Find closest approach
        const closest = asteroids.reduce((closest, current) => {
            const currentDistance = parseFloat(current.close_approach_data[0].miss_distance.kilometers);
            const closestDistance = parseFloat(closest.close_approach_data[0].miss_distance.kilometers);
            return currentDistance < closestDistance ? current : closest;
        });
        
        closestApproach = `${(parseFloat(closest.close_approach_data[0].miss_distance.kilometers) / 1000000).toFixed(2)}M km`;
        
        // Find largest diameter
        largestDiameter = Math.max(...asteroids.map(a => a.estimated_diameter.kilometers.estimated_diameter_max)).toFixed(2);
    }
    
    statsContainer.innerHTML = `
        <div class="data-item">
            <h3>Total Objects</h3>
            <div class="data-value">${total}</div>
            <p>Near-Earth asteroids</p>
        </div>
        <div class="data-item">
            <h3>Potentially Hazardous</h3>
            <div class="data-value" style="color: ${hazardous > 0 ? '#ff4d00' : '#4caf50'}">${hazardous}</div>
            <p>Require monitoring</p>
        </div>
        <div class="data-item">
            <h3>Closest Approach</h3>
            <div class="data-value">${closestApproach}</div>
            <p>Next 7 days</p>
        </div>
        <div class="data-item">
            <h3>Largest Object</h3>
            <div class="data-value">${largestDiameter}</div>
            <p>Diameter in km</p>
        </div>
    `;
}

// Plot asteroids on the map
function plotAsteroidsOnMap(asteroids) {
    if (!window.asteroidMap) {
        initAsteroidMap();
    }
    
    clearAsteroidMap();
    
    asteroids.forEach(asteroid => {
        const closeApproach = asteroid.close_approach_data[0];
        
        // For demonstration, we'll use a simulated position based on approach data
        // In a real implementation, you'd calculate the actual approach coordinates
        const lat = Math.random() * 180 - 90;
        const lng = Math.random() * 360 - 180;
        
        const marker = L.circleMarker([lat, lng], {
            color: asteroid.is_potentially_hazardous_asteroid ? '#ff4d00' : '#ff9d00',
            fillColor: asteroid.is_potentially_hazardous_asteroid ? '#ff4d00' : '#ff9d00',
            fillOpacity: 0.7,
            radius: Math.max(5, asteroid.estimated_diameter.kilometers.estimated_diameter_max * 10)
        }).addTo(window.asteroidMap);
        
        marker.bindPopup(`
            <strong>${asteroid.name}</strong><br>
            Diameter: ${asteroid.estimated_diameter.kilometers.estimated_diameter_max.toFixed(3)} km<br>
            Velocity: ${parseFloat(closeApproach.relative_velocity.kilometers_per_second).toFixed(2)} km/s<br>
            Miss Distance: ${(parseFloat(closeApproach.miss_distance.kilometers) / 1000000).toFixed(2)}M km<br>
            ${asteroid.is_potentially_hazardous_asteroid ? '<span style="color: #ff4d00;">Potentially Hazardous</span>' : ''}
        `);
    });
}

// Initialize asteroid map
function initAsteroidMap() {
    window.asteroidMap = L.map('asteroid-map').setView([20, 0], 2);
    
    L.tileLayer('https://{s}.tile.openstreetmap.org/{z}/{x}/{y}.png', {
        attribution: '© OpenStreetMap contributors'
    }).addTo(window.asteroidMap);
}

// Clear asteroid map
function clearAsteroidMap() {
    if (!window.asteroidMap) return;
    
    window.asteroidMap.eachLayer(layer => {
        if (layer instanceof L.CircleMarker) {
            window.asteroidMap.removeLayer(layer);
        }
    });
}

// Show only close approaches
function showCloseApproaches() {
    if (!window.currentAsteroidData) return;
    
    const closeAsteroids = window.currentAsteroidData.filter(asteroid => {
        const distance = parseFloat(asteroid.close_approach_data[0].miss_distance.kilometers);
        return distance < 10000000; // 10 million km
    });
    
    updateAsteroidList(closeAsteroids);
    plotAsteroidsOnMap(closeAsteroids);
}

// Show only hazardous asteroids
function showHazardousAsteroids() {
    if (!window.currentAsteroidData) return;
    
    const hazardousAsteroids = window.currentAsteroidData.filter(asteroid => 
        asteroid.is_potentially_hazardous_asteroid
    );
    
    updateAsteroidList(hazardousAsteroids);
    plotAsteroidsOnMap(hazardousAsteroids);
}

// Sort asteroids
function sortAsteroids() {
    if (!window.currentAsteroidData) return;
    
    const sortBy = document.getElementById('sort-by').value;
    let sortedAsteroids = [...window.currentAsteroidData];
    
    switch(sortBy) {
        case 'miss_distance':
            sortedAsteroids.sort((a, b) => 
                parseFloat(a.close_approach_data[0].miss_distance.kilometers) - 
                parseFloat(b.close_approach_data[0].miss_distance.kilometers)
            );
            break;
        case 'velocity':
            sortedAsteroids.sort((a, b) => 
                parseFloat(b.close_approach_data[0].relative_velocity.kilometers_per_second) - 
                parseFloat(a.close_approach_data[0].relative_velocity.kilometers_per_second)
            );
            break;
        case 'size':
            sortedAsteroids.sort((a, b) => 
                b.estimated_diameter.kilometers.estimated_diameter_max - 
                a.estimated_diameter.kilometers.estimated_diameter_max
            );
            break;
        case 'hazardous':
            sortedAsteroids.sort((a, b) => 
                (b.is_potentially_hazardous_asteroid ? 1 : 0) - (a.is_potentially_hazardous_asteroid ? 1 : 0)
            );
            break;
    }
    
    updateAsteroidList(sortedAsteroids);
}

// Simulate impact for selected asteroid
function simulateAsteroidImpact(asteroid) {
    const diameter = asteroid.estimated_diameter.kilometers.estimated_diameter_max * 1000; // Convert to meters
    const velocity = parseFloat(asteroid.close_approach_data[0].relative_velocity.kilometers_per_second);
    
    // Set simulator parameters
    document.getElementById('planet-select').value = 'earth';
    document.getElementById('diameter-slider').value = diameter;
    document.getElementById('diameter-value').textContent = Math.round(diameter);
    document.getElementById('velocity-slider').value = velocity;
    document.getElementById('velocity-value').textContent = velocity.toFixed(1);
    document.getElementById('type-select').value = 'stony';
    document.getElementById('angle-slider').value = 45;
    document.getElementById('angle-value').textContent = '45';
    document.getElementById('location-select').value = 'land';
    
    // Switch to simulator tab
    switchToTab('simulator');
    
    // Show info about the selected asteroid
    document.getElementById('simulation-results').innerHTML = `
        <h3>Selected Asteroid: ${asteroid.name}</h3>
        <p>Simulating impact based on real data from NASA.</p>
        <div class="detailed-results">
            <div class="result-item">
                <span class="result-label">Estimated Diameter:</span> ${(diameter/1000).toFixed(3)} km
            </div>
            <div class="result-item">
                <span class="result-label">Approach Velocity:</span> ${velocity.toFixed(2)} km/s
            </div>
            <div class="result-item">
                <span class="result-label">Miss Distance:</span> ${(parseFloat(asteroid.close_approach_data[0].miss_distance.kilometers)/1000000).toFixed(2)}M km
            </div>
            ${asteroid.is_potentially_hazardous_asteroid ? 
                '<div class="result-item"><span class="result-label">Status:</span> <span style="color: #ff4d00;">Potentially Hazardous</span></div>' : ''}
        </div>
        <p style="margin-top: 15px;">Click "Simulate Impact" to run the simulation.</p>
    `;
}

// Fallback sample data if API fails
function useSampleAsteroidData(hazardousOnly) {
    const sampleAsteroids = [
        {
            id: "1",
            name: "(2025 AB1)",
            estimated_diameter: {
                kilometers: {
                    estimated_diameter_max: 0.15
                }
            },
            is_potentially_hazardous_asteroid: false,
            close_approach_data: [{
                close_approach_date: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0],
                miss_distance: { kilometers: "7500000" },
                relative_velocity: { kilometers_per_second: "12.5" }
            }]
        },
        {
            id: "2",
            name: "(2025 CD2)",
            estimated_diameter: {
                kilometers: {
                    estimated_diameter_max: 0.8
                }
            },
            is_potentially_hazardous_asteroid: true,
            close_approach_data: [{
                close_approach_date: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0],
                miss_distance: { kilometers: "15000000" },
                relative_velocity: { kilometers_per_second: "18.2" }
            }]
        }
    ];
    
    let filteredAsteroids = hazardousOnly ? 
        sampleAsteroids.filter(asteroid => asteroid.is_potentially_hazardous_asteroid) : 
        sampleAsteroids;
    
    window.currentAsteroidData = filteredAsteroids;
    updateAsteroidList(filteredAsteroids);
    updateAsteroidStats(filteredAsteroids);
    plotAsteroidsOnMap(filteredAsteroids);
}
    </script>
